articles.title: Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to February 11 Factory of Ryongsong Machine Complex
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to February 11 Factory of Ryongsong Machine Complex
Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, provided field guidance to the February 11 Factory of the Ryongsong Machine Complex.
					He was accompanied by Pak Thae Song, Hwang Pyong So, Hong Yong Chil and Yun Tong Hyon.
					
					He looked round the room dedicated to the education in the revolutionary history.
					
					Watching with great attention precious historic relics and data there, he looked back with deep emotion on the shining course covered by the factory.
					
					Looking round various places of the factory including the processing shop, heat treatment shop and assembling shop, he learnt in detail about the modernization of equipment and production.
					
					At the processing shop he acquainted himself with the use of the old equipment.
					
					He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the workers and technicians of the factory remarkably improved the performance of the equipment by positively introducing latest technology including digital display into updating the existing equipment, true to the instructions given by leader Kim Jong Il during his field guidance to the factory.
					
					Noting that the factory set high goals and achieved a lot of successes by stepping up the modernization of equipment in recent years, he said he was pleased that the factory updated old equipment with less cost, in particular.
					
					He underscored the need for other units to conduct a dynamic campaign to make an effective use of the existing equipment as the factory did when updating equipment.
					
					Learning about the technical specifications and economic efficiency of the CNC-based metal-working machine produced by the factory by its own efforts and with indigenous technology, he said it is good for the factory to manufacture efficient machines and use them in production. He also learned about the operation of the CNC-based machines newly installed at the factory.
					
					Making a round of the heat treatment shop, he praised the workers of the factory for having modernized the heat treatment process through a campaign for technical innovations and thereby improving the quality of material heat treatment while cutting down its cost.
					
					At the assembling shop he saw a newly built modern machine and highly praised once again the workers of the factory for their successes in production and scientific and technological achievements.
					
					Noting that many machines and equipment are now required by various fields, he underlined the need to operate the factory in full capacity by taking thorough measures for the supply of materials.
					
					If the factory is to carry out its plan without fail, it is necessary for it to scrupulously organize production, step up the work to put the production processes on a modern and scientific basis and steadily improve the technical skills of its workers, he added.
					
					Then he visited various places of the factory including a canteen, daily provision store and bean processing ground to pay deep attention to the living of its workers.
					
					Expressing expectation that the employees of the factory would make a contribution to the development of the country's machine-building industry by registering bigger successes in production, he had a photo session with them.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Letter from KPA Officer and His Wife
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Letter from KPA Officer and His Wife
Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un received a letter of thanks from Rim Kwang Chol, officer of the Korean People's Army, and his wife Ri Jang Mi on June 18. 
					The letter extended deep thanks, moved by the care shown for miraculously saving their son from the jaw of death under the socialist healthcare system. 
					
					It was October last just two months after the birth of their son Rim Wi Hun that he was diagnosed as ventricular septal defect accompanied by pulmonary hypotension, congenital heart disease. 
					
					He was first admitted to the Children's Hospital in South Hwanghae Province and then to the Heart Vein Surgery of Pyongyang Medical College Hospital of Kim Il Sung University. He has received intensive treatment for 40 days and heart operation on January 15. 
					
					The hospital used artificial lung, more than 20 modern medical equipment and hundreds of expensive injections of at least 30 kinds for the treatment for the baby. 
					
					In the future, the baby will receive general medical examination once every six months at the Central Children's Hospital to be built under the loving care of Kim Jong Un. 
					
					The couple in the letter extended profound thanks to Kim Jong Un, deeply moved by the warm care shown by him for their son. In their letter the couple noted that Rim Wi Hun, a son of an ordinary military family, received such heart operation free of charge though such operation would cost hundreds of thousands of U.S. dollars in other countries. 
					
					The 90 days my son spent at the hospital were an unforgettable period in which we family keenly realized under what benevolent system we have lived and what profound meaning is reflected in the words that the whole country is a big harmonious family whose father is the Marshal, the letter noted, and went on:
					
					Strongly beating in the body of our son is the heart completely cured thanks to your love for the people and the younger generation. 
					
					They evinced their resolution to bring up their son as a stalwart soldier devotedly defending the leader and become a model family in the unit by working hard for his service personnel.

articles.title: Congratulations to Mongolian President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Mongolian President
Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Friday sent a congratulatory message to Tsakhiagiin Elbegdorj upon his reelection as president of Mongolia.
					The message wished the Mongolian president bigger successes in his responsible work for the prosperity of the country and its people's wellbeing.
					
					It expressed belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries greeting the 65th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations this year would make steady progress in various fields in the future, too.

articles.title: DPRK Weightlifters Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Weightlifters Back Home
Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- DPRK weightlifters returned home on Friday after participating in the 2013 Asian Weightlifting Championship.
					They bagged 15 gold medals, eight silver medals and five bronze medals at the championship, coming first in winning medals.

articles.title: More Mass Rallies Held in DPRK
articles.content:
More Mass Rallies Held in DPRK
Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- Mass rallies took place in North Hwanghae and Ryanggang provinces and Nampho City on Friday on the occasion of June 25, the day of struggle against U.S. imperialism.
					Present there were senior officials of the local party and power organs and working people's organizations, officials and other people of industrial establishments and cooperative farms and teachers and students of universities and colleges.
					
					At the rallies speakers said the Korean war ignited by the U.S. imperialists was the most barbarous and unethical war of aggression in human history of wars aimed to destroy the DPRK in its cradle and realize world domination.
					
					The U.S. imperialists hurled more than 2 million troops and destructive weapons to swallow up the DPRK but suffered a disgraceful defeat in face of the heroic struggle of the army and people of the DPRK united close around the party and the leader, they stressed.
					
					The U.S. imperialists, far from drawing a lesson from that disgraceful defeat, have been keen to unleash a nuclear war, gravely threatening the sovereignty of the DPRK, they charged.
					
					They called upon all officials and other people to become fortresses and shields devotedly defending the headquarters of the revolution with the firm belief that they are sure to win as they are led by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					They underlined the need to remain loyal to the Songun revolutionary leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea, win a final victory in the confrontation with the U.S. which has lasted for several decades and build the most powerful nation.
					
					At the end of the rallies their participants staged demonstrations.

articles.title: War-related Historic Site Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
articles.content:
War-related Historic Site Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- Many people, including servicepersons and schoolchildren, have visited the Historic Site Associated with the Fatherland Liberation War. 
					The number of visitors has reached at least 5.7 million. 
					
					More than 90,000 people of different social standings have visited the site in the first six months of the year which marks the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					At the site President Kim Il Sung had the Supreme Command from January of Juche 40 (1951) to July of 1953, arousing the army and people of the DPRK to the sacred battles of justice to beat back the aggression of the U.S. imperialists who boasted of being "the strongest" in the world and protect the freedom and independence of the country. 
					
					Preserved there with good care are the command post of the Supreme Command and other historic buildings and relics which bear witness to the outstanding military wisdom, Juche-based war methods, matchless grit and gut and noble popular virtues of the President.

articles.title: Victorious Seoul Liberation Operation Conducted in Korean War
articles.content:
Victorious Seoul Liberation Operation Conducted in Korean War
Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- In response to the strategic line of President Kim Il Sung on going over to a counter-attack, units of the Korean People's Army encircled Seoul City three days after the outbreak of the U.S.-unleashed Korean War (June 25, 1950-July 27, 1953).
					On the evening of June 27, Juche 39 (1950), KPA Supreme Commander Kim Il Sung issued an order to launch an overall offensive, scheduled for the nighttime, in daytime in apprehension of possible damage to people's life and wealth and the national cultural heritages in the city.
					
					The order could be given only by Kim Il Sung, who would put the interests of people above anything else.
					
					Upon hearing the news after the city's liberation, the Seoul citizens were greatly impressed, shouting "Long live General Kim Il Sung!" in tears.

articles.title: Joint Meeting of Soldiers, People Held
articles.content:
Joint Meeting of Soldiers, People Held
Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- The group of service personnel of the Korean People's Army marching to the revolutionary sites in front areas held a joint meeting with Kaesong citizens City at Kaesong Square in the city on Friday. 
					Present there were generals and officers of the KPA, members of the group, war veterans, servicemen's families, workers, youth and students in the city.
					
					The speakers said that the meeting is a great assembly demonstrating indomitable faith of the service personnel and people to bring about a final victory at any cost in the anti-imperialist and anti-U.S. confrontation.
					
					The people residing in the city close to the Military Demarcation Line are growing stronger in their will to share their fate with the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un to the last, they added.
					
					War veterans said the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War is the victory of outstanding military idea, Juche-oriented war methods, superb strategy and tactics of President Kim Il Sung. It is also a brilliant result of ardent patriotism and indomitable fighting spirit of the KPA soldiers and people who turned out in the struggle for devotedly defending the country, they added. 
					
					The soldiers from the frontline posts, youth and students evinced their will to deeply cherish the fighting spirit of the heroic soldiers during the war and wipe out the brigandish U.S. imperialists and the south Korean group of traitors by the concerted efforts of the army and people.
					
					The disabled soldiers pledged to always remain soldiers of the Supreme Commander just as they did during their service in the army and the servicemen's families renewed their will to take care of the soldiers at the posts as their real parents would do. 
					
					Meanwhile, the group of study tour held an oath-taking meeting in front of the statue of the President in Kaesong City on the same day. 
					
					All the participants vowed to firmly support with arms the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked in DPRK
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked in DPRK
Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place at the Pyongyang Circus Theater Friday to mark the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Theory on Circus". 
					The work, published on June 29, Juche 82 (1993), clarifies the essence of the Juche-oriented circus and its historic roots, formal nature, main principle in creating circus pieces and tasks and ways for implementing it and the orientation for its development. 
					
					Pak Su Ok, general director of the National Circus, in his report said that the work serves as powerful ideological and theoretical weapon for steadily developing the Juche-oriented circus art and important guidelines for the revolutionary circus art contributing to building a thriving socialist nation and ushering in a heyday of high civilization in the 21st century. 
					
					He went on:
					
					Over the last two decades since the publication of the work, the Juche circus art has covered a shining course of development. 
					
					The undying exploits the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu performed by establishing the proud tradition of the circus art of Korean style and ushering in shining heyday are shining brilliantly under the wise guidance of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					He called upon the officials, creators and artistes in the field of circus art to intensify the drive for further developing the circus art of the country. 
					
					Present at the meeting were officials concerned, officials and creators and artistes in the field of circus art and teachers, researchers and students of educational institutions.

articles.title: Susan-ri House of Class Education
articles.content:
Susan-ri House of Class Education
Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- The Susan-ri House of Class Education in Kangso District, Nampho City of the DPRK, is one of the showcases testifying to the atrocities committed by the U.S. aggression forces during the Korean War (June 25, 1950-July 27, 1953).
					On display there are more than 500 photos, 710 odd pieces of relics in 280 kinds and over 1 500 evidential materials.
					
					When they temporarily occupied Kangso County during the war, the U.S. imperialist aggressors, together with their stooges, conducted mass killing of its inhabitants, leaving 11 600 people dead in 46 days.
					
					They massacred 1 050 people in Susan-myon (sub-county), which accounted for one third of its population.
					
					Some 2 790 innocent people were killed and 1 300 hectares of farmland ravaged by 130 rounds of devastating bombing.
					
					Among the exhibits are photos picturing the damage caused by germ bombs dropped by U.S. warplanes.
					
					Visitors can see a torture site, a prison building and mass grave outside the class education house.
					
					Tens of thousands of people have visited the house in recent 10 days on the occasion of the day of the outbreak of the Korean War.

articles.title: National Schoolchildren's Sports Contest for Jongilbong Prize Closes
articles.content:
National Schoolchildren's Sports Contest for Jongilbong Prize Closes
Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- The 39th national schoolchildren's sports contest for Jongilbong prize closed with due ceremony in Hamhung Friday.
					The contest took place in Pyongyang, Phyongsong and Hamhung cities. Players fully displayed their skills they have trained through extracurricular sports activities, collectivism and high morality in the contest.
					
					They competed in basketball, volleyball, table-tennis, rhythmic gymnastics, etc. The contest was held in three stages, divided into senior and junior secondary schools and primary schools. Players of Pyongyang City came first in team standings.

articles.title: Rainy Season to Begin in Early July in Korea
articles.content:
Rainy Season to Begin in Early July in Korea
Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- Most parts of the Korean Peninsula have experienced high temperature in recent days, with frequent showers seen in some areas.
					The weather will remain unchanged until the end of June. Then it will be affected by rainy front expected to come towards the central area, North and South Hwanghae provinces, from early July, starting this year's rainy spell around July 2.
					
					The rainy front is now staying along the parallel from the lower Yangtze River in China to the sea south of Japan.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Paving Wide Avenue for Prosperity through Army-People Unity
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Paving Wide Avenue for Prosperity through Army-People Unity
Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday editorially calls for powerfully demonstrating the might of army-people unity, coordinated operation of the army and people and building the most powerful nation on this land at the new speed of a-match-for-a-hundred offensive in the 21st century.
					The Songun revolutionary history of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il is shining as the sacred history in which they brought great victories and changes by dint of the might of army-people unity and the coordinated operation of the  army and people, the editorial  says, and goes on:
					
					This coordinated operation serves as a powerful engine which helps thoroughly implement the new line of the Workers' Party of Korea on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force and an effective treasured sword to win a final victory in showdown with the imperialist aggressors.
					
					It is an offensive operation of Songun Korea to usher in a new era of high civilization in the 21st century.
					
					The 65th anniversary of the glorious DPRK and the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War are drawing nearer.  The fighting goal of the DPRK today is immensely high and the tasks are vast. But there is no fortress unconquerable for it as long as there are the wise leadership of the great WPK and the single-minded unity of all service personnel and people.
					
					It is necessary to usher in the new period of prosperity in the era of the dear respected Kim Jong Un by creating the speed of great advance of Songun Korea in step with the advance at the "Masikryong Speed." Now is the time to more dynamically conduct the coordinated operation of the army and people at a lightning tempo.
					
					The above-said coordinated operation serves as an effective fighting method for winning victory after victory in the general offensive for building a thriving nation in the present stirring times when the army and people have the great brilliant Songun commander at the helm of the revolution.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Warmongers Urged Not to Forget Shameful Defeat in Korean War
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Warmongers Urged Not to Forget Shameful Defeat in Korean War
Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, U.S. Congress passed a resolution on designating this year as "year of Korean war veterans" and the "Korean War Memorial" was opened at the building of the U.S. Defense Department. The U.S. war-like forces claimed that the June 25 war "was a victorious war" but it has been called a "forgotten war" as it was fought between the Second World War and the Vietnam War. Now is the time to re-estimate the war as the "forgotten victory," they added. Echoing what their master uttered, the south Korean puppet forces are describing the battle in Chunchon area, the battle on the River Rakdong and the operation for landing in Inchon as "three major war victories." They are busy staging burlesques for "demonstrating strong alliance" with the U.S. and its allies.
					Rodong Sinmun Friday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					Those, who signed a paper of surrender, deplored that they waged a wrong war against wrong "enemies" in a wrong place at a wrong time. Yet, they are vociferating about "forgotten victory". This is provoking side-splitting laughter.
					
					The strange farces being staged by them to "commemorate the anniversary of war victory" are nothing but a revelation of their provocative intention to cover up their true colors as a war provoker and overcome the shame suffered by the loser with the will to seek revenge and thus unleash the second Korean war at any cost.
					
					The provokers should clearly know that the DPRK has tremendous nuclear force for self-defence to disable the U.S. nuclear stick at a blow and the invincible revolutionary army fully determined to wipe out the enemies at all times.
					
					The U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet warmongers should bear in mind the declaration of Songun Korea that June 25, the date of the outbreak of the war, will always be followed by July 27, the victory day to be celebrated by it, and a final victory will be in store for it.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Flayed for Branding Pro-Reunification Champions as "Wartime S. Korean Abductees"
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Flayed for Branding Pro-Reunification Champions as "Wartime S. Korean Abductees"
Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea (DFRK) on June 28 gave the following answer to a question put by KCNA as regards the south Korean puppet regime's such reckless action as defining as "wartime south Korean abductees" the pro-reunification patriots who came to the DPRK in quest of justice and truth during the past Fatherland Liberation War:
					Recently the puppet regime branded 274 pro-reunification patriotic figures including Kim Kyu Sik as "wartime south Korean abductees" at the 10th meeting of "the committee for probing the truth behind abductions of south Koreans during the June 25 war and reinstating the abductees."
					
					The "wartime abductees" were those who came to the embrace of the DPRK of their own accord, disillusioned with the rule of the Syngman Rhee's puppet regime, pro-U.S., sycophantic and unpopular, during the Korean War.
					
					The puppet regime's action is an intolerable insult to those people and their bereaved families and the DPRK and another base provocation to it.
					
					As for Kim Kyu Sik, he participated in the Joint Conference of Representatives of Political Parties and Social Organizations in North and South Korea held in Pyongyang in April 1948 and had the honor of being received by President Kim Il Sung. Deeply moved by the great, patriotic will and broad magnanimity of the President, he bravely fought against the moves of the U.S. imperialists and their stooges to partition the country and ignite a war after going back to south Korea. After coming back to the north under the care of the President in September 1950, he devoted himself to the struggle for national reunification as vice-president of the Consultative Council of Former South Korean Politicians in the North for the Promotion of Peaceful Reunification till the last moments of his life.
					
					Kim Kyu Sik dedicated his whole life to the service to the country and the nation after coming to the care of the President and now enjoys an eternal life. The action taken against him clearly shows what a reckless stage the puppet regime has reached in the smear campaign against the DPRK.
					
					Clear is the aim sought by the puppet regime through the action.
					
					It is a revelation of the black-hearted intention to hype the issue of "the wartime south Korean abductees" as one more "issue of the human rights in the north" in an effort to intensify the smear campaign against the DPRK in the international arena, insult the pro-reunification patriots who came to the care of the DPRK and tarnish its image.
					
					 Lurking behind this is its sordid intention to put on the table the issue of "wartime south Korean abductees" together with the issue of "ROK army POWs" and "abductees by the north" when dealing with the north-south ties in the future, create complexity and attain its sinister politically-motivated aim.
					
					"Abductees by the north" and "ROK army POWs" were all made up by the puppet group.
					
					"The committee for probing the truth behind abductions of south Koreans during the June 25 war and reinstating the abductees" recently defined pro-reunification figures as "wartime south Korean abductees". The committee, a base for hatching plots against the DPRK, is under the office of the puppet "prime minister" and run by Chongwadae and him.
					
					The puppet group is working with blood-shot eyes to kick up a racket for escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen through the definition of the "wartime south Korean abductees" but such a sinister attempt and dirty and shameless deception will not convince anyone.
					
					The anti-DPRK smear campaign by the puppet group will only disclose its dirty nature as confrontational maniacs, touching off stronger censure and denunciation by the entire nation and the world conscience.
					
					We will never pardon the puppet group but will keep tabs on their criminal acts.
					
					The puppet group should face up to the desire of the nation and the trend of the times and immediately stop the confrontation racket.

articles.title: S. Korean Intelligence Service Derided as Tattler
articles.content:
S. Korean Intelligence Service Derided as Tattler
Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- The Wall Street Journal derided the Intelligence Service of south Korea as a tattler for opening to public the minutes of the 2007 north-south summit.
					In an article, the paper said it is common practices that intelligence agencies tend to keep secrets rather than disclosing them. But the south Korean Intelligence Service opened to public the minutes that have been classified as confidential, pulling the trigger of political standoff.
					
					The then south Korean "President" Roh Moo Hyun did not make any words signaling south Korea's will to scrap the "northern limit line", according to the minutes, said the paper.
					
					The disclosure of the minutes by the Intelligence Service reminds one of the saying which goes "A wicked man is his own hell."
					
					This proves that the puppet group are made up of mentally deranged men who are steeped in obliterating the "forces following the north", and hooligans and philistines ignorant of the elementary politics, diplomatic common sense and ethics of the north-south relations.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Denounce Puppet Group's Act of Treachery
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Denounce Puppet Group's Act of Treachery
Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- Progressive and reunification organizations of south Korea on June 25 staged an action denouncing the puppet group for opening to public the minutes of the 2007 north-south summit, a treacherous act of escalating confrontation.
					They held a press conference in Seoul accusing the Intelligence Service of opening to public the minutes of the inter-Korean summit.
					
					They said that the minutes include various themes of secrets, adding their disclosure amounts to the crime of revealing secret.
					
					Progressive organizations including the Solidarity for Progress and the Catholic Alliance for Justice held a press conference before Chongwadae. They branded the IS's act of violating democracy and law through intervention in the election and soon opening to public the minutes of the inter-Korean summit as a typical political chicanery to  tone down the public criticism of its interference in the election and its act of making the south-north dialogue and cooperation abortive.
					
					The organizations urged the present chief executive to hold full responsibility for the IS's act of interfering in the election by using even secret document.
					
					The Kwangju-South Jolla Provincial Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration held a press conference before the Kwangju City Building of the "Saenuri Party", terming the revelation of the minutes by the IS and the "Saenuri Party" a violation of law and a political plot to cover up the case of the IS's interference in the election.
					
					The organization urged the "government" to opt for the south-north dialogue without preconditions, adding that the present regime's act of heightening the awareness of confrontation with the DPRK casts doubt about its willingness for peace.

articles.title: Professors of S. Korean Universities Stage Campaign of Declaration on Situation
articles.content:
Professors of S. Korean Universities Stage Campaign of Declaration on Situation
Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- Professors of south Korean universities are supporting the campaign of declaration on the situation denouncing the Intelligence Service for its interference in the election and the security authorities for their curtailed investigation into the case, according to CBS of south Korea.
					More than 40 professors of Hanyang University on June 26 issued a declaration on the situation urging the present chief executive to face severe judgment by the people as regards the case.
					
					At least 10 professors of Catholic University warned that if the "government" passes the blame for the election scandal to the preceding regime, it would meet bigger resistance by the people.

articles.title: Resignation of IS Director Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Resignation of IS Director Demanded in S. Korea
Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean opposition Democratic Party demanded the resignation of the director of the Intelligence Service, who opened to public the minutes of the north-south summit, according to south Korean KBS.
					The executive chairman of the Democratic Party said at the "National Assembly" on June 26 the disclosure of the minutes signaled the ruin of the south Korean diplomacy.
					
					The present chief executive should apologize to the people for this, he said, demanding the resignation of the IS director.

articles.title: U.S. Urged to Respond to DPRK's Proposal
articles.content:
U.S. Urged to Respond to DPRK's Proposal
Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- The Central Association of Korean Nationals in Russia issued a statement on June 17 in support of the crucial statement of the spokesman for the DPRK National Defence Commission (NDC) which proposed high-level talks between the authorities of the DPRK and the U.S.
					The statement recalled that the spokesman for the NDC made an important proposal on holding the high-level talks between the authorities of the DPRK and the U.S. to remove the tensions on the Korean Peninsula and achieve regional peace and security.
					
					This is a peace-loving and broad-minded important resolution made by the DPRK out of desire for detente on the peninsula and the overhaul of the bilateral relations, the statement said.
					
					It is the U.S. which has escalated the situation on the peninsula, the statement said, adding it ignited the war against the DPRK in 1950 and has led the situation to the brink of war, persistently pursuing the vicious policy against the DPRK although 60 years have passed since the Armistice Agreement was signed.
					
					The U.S. is still misleading public opinion to pass the buck for the escalating tension to the DPRK by confusing right and wrong, and steadily increasing the nuclear threat and pressure on the DPRK, it noted.
					
					It stressed that the U.S. should clearly know who its rival is and how the situation is and respond to the DPRK's proposal.

articles.title: U.S. Urged to Respond to DPRK's Proposal for Dialogue as Early as Possible
articles.content:
U.S. Urged to Respond to DPRK's Proposal for Dialogue as Early as Possible
Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- Organizations in Peru and Democratic Congo issued statements supporting the crucial statement issued by the spokesman for the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK.
					The Peruvian Committee for Friendship and Solidarity with Peoples on June 19 recalled the contents of the crucial statement, noting:
					
					This clear evidence shows the firm attitude and sincere efforts of the DPRK to realize the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula and achieve peace and stability in Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					The U.S. should immediately respond to the DPRK's proposal for dialogue.
					
					It should respond to dialogue in good faith as a party responsible for ensuring the peace and security on the peninsula and in Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					We send solidarity with the Korean people in their struggle for the security and reunification of the country, fully supporting the crucial statement issued by the spokesman for the NDC.
					
					The Democratic Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association said on June 21 that the DPRK's proposal for high-level talks between authorities of the DPRK and the U.S. is being unanimously hailed and supported by the world public.
					
					It continued:
					
					The U.S. refusal to respond to the dialogue with the DPRK, urging it to dismantle its nukes, indicates that it does not stand for peace in the Korean peninsula and the world.
					
					We strongly urge the U.S. to respond to the dialogue with the DPRK as soon as possible.
					
					We hope the Korean people will achieve signal progress in their efforts to replace the Korean Armistice Agreement with a peace treaty and achieve durable peace and stability on the peninsula this year, the 60th anniversary of their victory in the war.

articles.title: International Community Urges U.S. to Roll back Its Hostile Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
International Community Urges U.S. to Roll Back Its Hostile Policy toward DPRK
Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- The international community is strongly urging the U.S. not to pursue a dangerous hostile policy toward the DPRK but face up to the situation and behave itself.
					The Russian paper Pravda in an article titled "Disgraceful setbacks in U.S. policies toward the DPRK" said:
					
					The whole world is aware that the DPRK doesn't make an empty talk.
					
					The DPRK demonstrated before the whole world that it emerged a full-fledged nuclear weapons state and missile power.
					
					It remains rock-firm despite any hostile moves to stifle it.
					
					The U.S. should seek a solution in its repeated failures in its policies toward the DPRK.
					
					The vice-president of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil noted the U.S. should choose between the two options: whether to seek detente and stability or to push the situation to an explosive point by sticking to its hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					The secretary general of the France-Korea Friendship Association said detente on the Korean Peninsula totally depends on whether the U.S. rolls back its hostile policy toward the DPRK or not.
					
					The Romanian Workers' Association in a statement said the U.S. policy to militarily stifle the DPRK has completely gone bust.
					
					The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in a joint statement said: If the U.S. keeps pursuing its policy of aggression against the DPRK, the latter will continue taking measures for self-defence. In case the former opts for a clash in the end, the service personnel and people of the latter will annihilate the aggressors and reunify the country.
					
					The Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union and the Peruvian Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea urged the U.S. to make a responsible choice as the arch criminal who spawned the nuclear issue on the peninsula and has escalated the tension.

articles.title: International Community Urges U.S. to Conclude Peace Treaty with DPRK
articles.content:
International Community Urges U.S. to Conclude Peace Treaty with DPRK
Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- The world progressives are becoming vocal urging the U.S. to stop at once its hostile moves against the DPRK and accept the DPRK's proposal on replacing the Korean Armistice Agreement (AA) by a peace treaty.
					Noting the proposal of the DPRK is not new, the Russian paper Tribuna said:
					
					The DPRK has proposed a peace treaty with the U.S. many times since the armistice but the latter has always turned it down.
					
					The DPRK declared the abrogation of the AA when the U.S. threat reached its height recently.
					
					The situation on the Korean Peninsula requires the conclusion of the peace treaty but Washington is shunning it. 
					
					The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association in a statement condemned the U.S. and the south Korean regime for having violated the AA since its conclusion.
					
					The vice-president of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil said it is the stand of the DPRK that it can not abandon its nuclear deterrence unless the AA is replaced by a peace treaty and the U.S. nuclear threat is defused.
					
					The vice-chairman of the France-Korea Friendship Association said:  The peace on the Korean Peninsula is being harassed not by the DPRK but by the U.S. which seeks to dominate the world after putting the Asia-Pacific region under its control. Now is the time to immediately conclude a peace treaty for terminating the Korean War. 
					
					The Finnish paper Tyokansan Sanomat said that the danger of war on the peninsula is coming from the U.S. It can never be a country ensuring world peace as it has always been an aggressor, it added.
					
					The Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Organization in a statement called on the Non-Aligned Movement and the world peace-loving people to urge the U.S. to conclude a peace treaty with the DPRK, normalize relations with it and respect its sovereignty.
					
					The Japan Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea stated:
					
					The U.S. should not unnecessarily escalate tension on the Korean Peninsula but replace the AA by a peace treaty and pull its forces out of south Korea. This is the only way of ensuring peace on the peninsula.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Nepali Newspaper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Nepali Newspaper
Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- The Nepali newspaper Majodur serially carried the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" from June 21 to 24.
					The work, published on April 6, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies that it is a principled requirement for victoriously advancing the cause of the Korean revolution to hold leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as  the eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					
					It sets forth the tasks to be fulfilled to steadily develop the WPK as the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					The paper carried a photo of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: WPK's Significant Day Marked in Various Countries
articles.content:
WPK's Significant Day Marked in Various Countries
Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) ? A seminar, round-table talks, a book and photo exhibition and film shows were held in South Africa, Pakistan, Brazil and Dominica on June 19 and 20 on the occasion of the 49th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					On display in the venues of functions were photos introducing the undying feats of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					Also displayed there were works of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu and books and photos introducing the DPRK.
					
					The chairman of the Group for the Study of the Progressive Ideas of South Africa at a seminar said that Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into the eternal party of Kim Il Sung which regards the Juche idea as its only guidelines, while working at the C.C., WPK.
					
					He noted that Kim Jong Il regarded it to believe in the people as in Heaven as the fundamental principle governing the WPK's activities and led it to demonstrate its might as the invincible party with a solid mass foundation.
					
					The secretary general of the Karachi Branch of the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association at round-table talks praised Kim Jong Il for developing the WPK into the party of Kim Il Sung and the force guiding the revolutionary cause of Songun.
					
					The chairman of the Brazilian Committee for Remembering Leader Kim Jong Il at a book and photo exhibition said that the Brazilians express support and solidarity with the Korean people dynamically advancing for a final victory while demonstrating the might of a nuclear weapon state and a satellite manufacturer and launcher under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					The participants of the film shows watched Korean films "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation" and "Monument to the Party Founding".

articles.title: Korean People's War Victory Day to Be Marked in Democratic Congo
articles.content:
Korean People's War Victory Day to Be Marked in Democratic Congo
Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of Democratic Congo for celebrating the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War was inaugurated in Kinshasa on June 22.
					Otete Gaston Mboyo, deputy general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Democratic Congo who doubles as chairman of the Democratic Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee. 
					
					The preparatory committee set the days from June 25 to July 27 as a celebration period and decided to hold diverse political and cultural events in the period.

articles.title: Korean People's Victory in War to Be Marked in Democratic Congo
articles.content:
Korean People's Victory in War: Personage of Democratic Congo
Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- Progressive mankind is sending warm congratulations to the Korean people on the 60th anniversary of their victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War and marking the day as a common jubilee.
					Otete Gaston Mboyo, deputy general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Democratic Congo who is chairman of the Democratic Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association, said this at an inaugural ceremony of the preparatory committee of Democratic Congo held on June 22 to mark the anniversary.
					
					He went on:
					
					July 27 this year is a significant day marking the 60th anniversary of the heroic Korean people's historic victory in the three-year Fatherland Liberation War fought against the imperialist allied forces headed by U.S. imperialism.
					
					The great victory of the Korean people clearly proved before the world that people who rise up for justice under the leadership of an outstanding leader can surely defeat any formidable enemy.
					
					The victory instilled great conviction and courage into the world people in their struggle for justice and peace against imperialism and colonialism and ushered in a new era of the national liberation struggle against imperialism in Asia, Africa and Latin America, he added.

articles.title: Russian and Nigerian Personages Pay Congratulatory Visits to DPRK Missions
articles.content:
Russian, Nigerian Personages Pay Congratulatory Visits to DPRK Missions
Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- Russian and Nigerian personages paid congratulatory visits to the DPRK's missions in their capital cities on June 19, the 49th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					They included the propaganda secretary of the Khabarovsk Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, the first secretary of the Khabarovsk City Committee of the Party, Ibrahim Mantu, member of the Credit Committee of the People's Democratic Party of Nigeria who doubles as chairman of the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association and a former Nigerian lawmaker.
					
					They placed bouquets before full-length paintings of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					The chairman of the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association said:
					
					The successes achieved by the DPRK under the wise leadership of HE Kim Jong Il win admiration of many people of the world.
					
					The DPRK has invariably advanced along its own road despite any moves of the U.S. and the West thanks to the dear respected Kim Jong Un, creditable successor to the idea and cause of Kim Jong Il.
					
					The balance of forces of the world has been kept thanks to the DPRK.
					
					The DPRK is the only country in the world which bars the U.S. from behaving arbitrarily.
					
					I would like to extend profound thanks to Kim Jong Un on behalf of progressive mankind.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe carta del matrimonio de oficial del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe carta del matrimonio de oficial del EPC
Pyongyang, 28 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio una carta que le dirigieran el dia 18 el oficial del Ejercito Popular de Corea Rim Kwang Chol y su esposa Ri Jang Mi para expresarle agradecimiento por la salvacion milagrosa de su hijo recien nacido gracias al regimen de salud publica socialista.
					En octubre del ano pasado, cuando cumplio dos meses de nacimiento apenas, a nuestro hijo Rim Wi Hun fue diagnosticada grave enfermedad cardiaca innata, comienza la carta.
					
					Fue internado primero al hospital pediatrico de la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur y trasladado despues a la consulta de cirugia cardiovascular del Hospital del Instituto Superior de Medicina de Pyongyang de la Universidad Kim Il Sung.
					
					Recibio el tratamiento intensivo de analepsia de 40 dias y la operacion cardiaca el 15 de enero pasado.
					
					Durante la hospitalizacion, fueron suministrados al bebe el pulmon artificial y cientos de ampollas de inyecciones costosas de mas 30 tipos y movilizados mas de una veintena de aparatos medicos sofisticados.
					
					El sera sometido al examen medico general una vez a cada 6 meses en el hospital pediatrico central que se construye por la iniciativa del Mariscal.
					
					El matrimonio de oficial expreso agradecimiento al destinatario por la operacion cardiaca que recibio a gratis su hijo y habria costado cientos de miles de US$ en otros paises.
					
					En los 90 dias de hospitalizacion de nuestro hijo, hemos sentido en carne propia cuan significativa es esta palabra: todo el pais es una gran familia armoniosa que tiene su padre en el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, escriben.
					
					Ahora en el cuerpo de nuestro hijo late fuertemente el nuevo corazon hecho por el calido amor del Mariscal por el pueblo y las generaciones venideras, aseveran.
					
					Formaremos a nuestro hijo como soldado dispuesto a defender al lider a costa de la vida, redoblaremos nuestros esfuerzos fisicos por los soldados y asi seremos familia ejemplar de nuestra unidad militar, concluyen.

articles.title: FDRP rechaza definicion de "surcoreanos raptados en tiempo de guerra"
articles.content:
FDRP rechaza definicion de "surcoreanos raptados en tiempo de guerra"
Pyongyang, 28 de junio (ACNC) -- El vocero del Comite Central del Frente Democratico para la Reunificacion de la Patria (FDRP) concedio el dia 28 una entrevista con la ACNC en relacion con que la banda de los titeres surcoreanos definio a los patriotas pro-reunificacion, quienes pasaron a la parte Norte de Corea en busca de justicia y verdad durante la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria (1950-1953), como "surcoreanos raptados en el tiempo de guerra".
					La respuesta sigue abajo:
					
					En la reciente 10a reunion del "comite para esclarecer la verdad de los raptados hacia el Norte en la guerra del 25 de junio y para recuperar el honor de ellos", los titeres surcoreanos definieron a 274 patriotas luchadores por la reunificacion, inclusive Kim Kyu Sik, como "surcoreanos raptados en tiempo de guerra".
					
					Los hombres definidos asi por los titeres surcoreanos son los que pasaron voluntariamente a la RPDC en el periodo de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria decepcionados de la gobernacion fantoche de Syngman Rhee, caracterizada por el servilismo proyanqui y la politica antipopular.
					
					Sin embargo, les impusieron la deshonra de "raptados en el tiempo de guerra" y este caso es un insulto nunca perdonable a esos patriotas y sus familiares y a la RPDC y otra sucia provocacion contra esa ultima.
					
					Kim Kyu Sik es celebre figura patriotica quien fue recibido por el Presidente Kim Il Sung cuando participo en la Conferencia Conjunta de Abril de los Representantes de los Partidos Politicos y las Organizaciones Sociales del Norte y el Sur de Corea, convocada en abril de 1948 en Pyongyang.
					
					Se hizo partidario del proposito patriotico del Presidente admirando su magnanimidad y terminada la conferencia, regreso al Sur de Corea donde lucho tenazmente contra las maniobras divisionistas y belicas del imperialismo norteamericano y sus lacayos. Y en septiembre de 1950, paso a la RPDC para acogerse al regazo del Presidente y trabajo con abnegacion hasta el ultimo momento de su vida por la reunificacion de la patria desempanando el cargo de vicepresidente del Consejo de los Surcoreanos en el Norte por la Promocion de la Reunificacion Pacifica.
					
					La infamia de "raptado" contra el demuestra claramente a que grado llegan las maniobras intrigantes de la banda titere surcoreana.
					
					El presente caso persigue el objetivo de recrudecer en la arena internacional la campana de DDHH anti-RPDC al describir el problema de "surcoreanos raptados en tiempo de guerra" como otro "problema de DDHH del Norte de Corea", calumniar a los patriotas pro-reunificacion que pasaron a la RPDC y manchar la imagen de esta.
					
					Otro objetivo esta en complicar las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas y satisfacer las siniestras ambiciones politicas al agregar ese asunto al paquete de "problemas" tales como "prisioneros del ejercito surcoreano" y "secuestrados por el Norte".
					
					El "comite" arriba mencionado es uno de los cuarteles generales de la campana anti-RPDC que esta adscrito a la oficina del "primer ministro" y trabaja a la indicacion directa de Chongwadae y el primer ministro.
					
					Aunque la banda surcoreana trata de enganar la opinion publica manipulando el presente caso y otros intrigantes en busca de enfrentamiento fratricida, sus actos descarados y malsanos no seran aceptados por nadie.
					
					Por el contrario, demostraran la sucia fachada de esos elementos enloquecidos por el enfrentamiento fratricida y suscitaran el repudio de toda la nacion coreana y la humanidad de conciencia.
					
					La RPDC no perdonara jamas este otro acto criminal de los traidores surcoreanos y ajustara cuentas sin falta.
					
					Al ver correctamente la aspiracion de todos los coreanos y la corriente de la epoca, la banda de los titeres surcoreanos debe parar ahora mismo sus locuras conflictivas.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam desea exitos en el trabajo del presidente de Mongolia
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam desea exitos en el trabajo del presidente de Mongolia
Pyongyang, 28 de junio (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 28 un mensaje de felicitacion al reelecto presidente de Mongolia, Tsakhiagiin Elbegdorj.
					El remitente desea al destinatario mayores exitos en sus responsabilidades para la prosperidad del pais y el bienestar del pueblo. 
					
					Manifiesta la conviccion de que en este ano del 65o aniversario del establecimiento de las relaciones diplomaticas entre los dos paises, se ampliaran y se desarrollaran incesantemente en varios dominios las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion Corea-Mongolia.

articles.title: Continuan mitines antiyanquis en provincias
articles.content:
Continuan mitines antiyanquis en provincias
Pyongyang, 28 de junio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del dia de lucha antiyanqui-25 de junio, tuvieron lugar el dia 28 los mitines multitudinarios en las provincias de Hwanghae del Norte y de Ryanggang y la ciudad de Nampho con la participacion de los cuadros de organismos locales del partido y el poder y entidades de masas, los funcionarios, trabajadores, profesores, empleados y estudiantes de las localidades respectivas. 
					Los oradores condenaron severamente que la guerra coreana provocada por los imperialistas yanquis fue la bestial y antihumanitaria sin precedente en la historia de la guerra de la humanidad encaminada a aplastar la Republica en su cuna y realizar la heguemonia mundial.
					
					Aunque se desesperaron por ocupar la RPDC movilizando mas de 2 millones de efectivos y las armas mortiferas, los imperialistas norteamericanos sufrieron la derrota vergonzosa por la lucha heroica del ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC, unidos compactamente en torno al Partido y el lider, destacaron.
					
					Denunciaron que lejos de sacar la leccion en la derrota sufrida en la guerra coreana, hoy tambien los yanquis amenazan gravemente la soberania del pais recurriendo a las maniobras tendentes a provocar la guerra nuclear.
					
					Se refirieron a que todos los funcionarios y trabajadores deben ser baluarte y escudo en defensa de la Direccion de la Revolucion con la  firme conviccion en que lograran sin falta la victoria gracias al Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Apuntaron la necesidad de lograr el triunfo final en la confrontacion antiyanqui librada de siglo en siglo en pleno acato a la direccion de la revolucion del Songun del Partido y construir dignamente en el suelo patrio el pais mas potente del mundo y el paraiso del pueblo.
					
					Al termino de mitines, los participantes hicieron el desafile.

articles.title: Mas de 5 millones visitan lugar de interes historico-revolucionario de guerra coreana
articles.content:
Mas de 5 millones visitan lugar de interes historico-revolucionario de guerra coreana
Pyongyang, 28 de junio (ACNC) -- En  estos dias, los militares del Ejercito Popular de Corea, los trabajadores de distintos estratos, jovenes y ninos escolares visitan sin parar el lugar de interes historico-revolucionario de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria (25 de junio de 1950-27 de julio de 1953).
					Hasta ahora el numero de visitantes llega a mas de 5 millones 700 mil.
					
					Durante el primer semestre de este ano del 60o aniversario del triunfo en esa contienda belica, lo visitaron mas de 90 mil de diferentes unidades en las localidades. 
					
					En ese lugar historico, el Presidente Kim Il Sung establecio la comandancia suprema desde enero de 1951 hasta julio de 1953 y llamo al ejercito y pueblo coreanos a la sagrada guerra de justicia por rechazar la agresion del imperialismo yanqui, que se jactaba de su "supremacia" mundial, y por defender la libertad y la independencia del pais. 
					
					Ahi estan conservados en estado original la comandancia suprema y otros edificios y materiales historicos que transmiten la extraordinaria inteligencia militar, los autoctonos metodos de combate, la audacia y temperamento y los nobles rasgos populares del Presidente.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun se burla de belicistas de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun se burla de belicistas de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 28 de junio (ACNC) -- Hace poco, el Congreso norteamericano aprobo el proyecto de resolucion de definir este ano como "ano de combatientes participantes en la guerra coreana". Y en la sede del Departamento de Defensa de EE.UU. se abrio la "sala de exposicion conmemorativa de la guerra coreana". 
					Los belicistas norteamericanos dicen que la pasada guerra coreana (25 de junio de 1950-27 de julio de 1953) fue la "guerra ganada", pero vino considerandose como la "olvidada" por haberse realizado entre la segunda guerra mundial y la guerra vietnamita. E insisten en que ya llego el tiempo de calificar de nuevo la pasada guerra coreana como "victoria olvidada". 
					
					Sumandose a esta campana de su amo gringo, los titeres surcoreanos describen la batalla de la zona de Chunchon, la de rio Rakdong, la operacion de desembarco en Inchon, etc. como "tres triunfos" de si mismos y libran las farsas para "manifestar la solidez de la alianza" con EE.UU. y sus satelites. 
					
					El diario Rodong Sinmun, en un comentario individual de este viernes, se burla de tales actos ridiculos de los belicistas que firmaron el acta de capitulacion diciendo que ellos mismos hicieron la guerra mala en el tiempo erroneo y en el lugar fallado contra los enemigos no seleccionados bien.
					
					La "conmemoracion de la guerra ganada" en EE.UU. parte de la malsana intencion de ocultar  la naturaleza de provocadores de la pasada guerra coreana y desatar a toda costa la segunda guerra coreana, revela el comentario y continua:
					
					Los provocadores deben darse clara cuenta de que la RPDC cuenta con las poderosas fuerzas armadas nucleares de autodefensa capaces de frustrar de un salto la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. y con el ejercito revolucionario invicto dispuesto a aniquilar a los enemigos.
					
					EE.UU. y los belicistas surcoreanos deben tener presente de la declaracion de la Corea del Songun de que la victoria final es la de RPDC.
